post_title: October’s Pick: Froggy Boots Go With Everything Review & Giveaway
post_text:
I am excited to introduce a new children’s book author to you this month!  Jill Zabkar Martin has written an adorable book for children called, Froggy Boots Go With Everything. This story makes me smile every time I read it.  This fun board book shows how a little boy not only wears his froggy boots everywhere, but he also creatively uses his Froggy Boots in everything he does each day.  Illustrator, Kirsten Gaede Van Mourick, also did an amazing job of bringing a fun-loving little boy and frog to life.

Another fun feature to Froggy Boots Go With Everything, is that your child can search for the frog on every page.  One page of the story shows the little boy playing in a sandbox.  He is pouring sand out of one of his froggy boots to fill up the back of his toy dump truck.  My son finds it extremely funny to discover the frog in the cab of the toy dump truck every time we read the book!  Aidan always says, “silly frog!”

The last page of Froggy Boots Go With Everything has a fun game for our young little book lovers.  The book pictures several different items that are shown throughout the story, and asks the child to go back and find these items in the book.  Aidan loves to search for all of these items.

The story is very cute and encourages creativity in children.  I also love all of the search and find activities in Froggy Boots Go With Everything.  My son enjoys these activities so much that I often find him paging through the book on his own just looking for the frog!  I am tempted to go on and on about this book, but I am afraid I will ruin the discovery of this lovely book for you and your child!  This adorable board book would make a great addition to any child’s personal library.  With baby #2 due around Christmas, I am already in Christmas shopping mode.  Froggy Boots Go With Everything would make a great stocking stuffer!

Buy It!

Go here to purchase a copy of Froggy Boots Go With Everything for the lovable child in your life!  Also, be sure to check out Jill Zabkar Martin’s new book, Ladybug Boots Go With Everything, which will be available in the Spring of 2011!
